properties.entry: select d.document_id, case when cast(left(right(uri, 8), 4) as int) % 3 = 0 then 'no fracture' else 'fracture' end class from @db.schema@.anno_source_doc_info s inner join @db.schema@.anno_base da on s.anno_base_id = da.anno_base_id inner join @db.schema@.document d on da.document_id = d.document_id where d.analysis_batch = 'weka_demo' and charindex('/reference set/', uri) > 1

select d.document_id, canonical_form, COUNT(*) from @db.schema@.anno_word_token w inner join @db.schema@.anno_base da on w.anno_base_id = da.anno_base_id inner join @db.schema@.document d on d.document_id = da.document_id inner join @db.schema@.anno_base b on da.document_id = b.document_id inner join @db.schema@.anno_source_doc_info s on b.anno_base_id = s.anno_base_id where canonical_form is not null and d.analysis_batch = 'weka_demo' and charindex('/reference set/', uri) > 1 group by d.document_id, canonical_form
